<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drive-By Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=3146) <actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 55 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Trick Driver](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=112)

**Prerequisites**
[Trick Driver Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3140)

**Requirements**
You are piloting a [vehicle](Vehicles.aspx).

</column>

---

You can smoothly line up an attack without disrupting your control. You [Drive](/Actions.aspx?ID=483), gaining the effects of the Drive action for the same number of actions you spent to Drive-By Attack. At any point during your vehicle's movement, you Strike.
name: Drive-By Attack
